entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. High 24. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers in the evening and after midnight. Showers beginning overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Low 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
